summary: Train passengers begin to confront each other when their ride stops in the middle of nowhere during dangerous weather.
cast: Toni Acosta|Karim Ait M'Hand|Roberto Álamo|Nao Albet|Ernesto Alterio|Carlos Areces|Lola Dueñas|Miki Esparbé|Aida Folch|Núria Gago|Saras Gil|Rubén Ochandiano|María Alfonsa Rosso|Manolo Segura|José Corbacho|Juan Cruz|Imanol Arias|Rossy de Palma
title: Incidencias
